entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 early this afternoon. High 21. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 17.
